prompt:
Please answer my code questions using the given API following this format: <<<api>>>: $API
<<<code>>>: $CODE
<<<explanation>>>: $EXPLANATION.
Question: How to handle Pop-up in Selenium WebDriver using Java: :I want to handle sign-in part in rediff.com, but the below code doesn't work for that:driver.get("http://www.rediff.com/");WebElement sign = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//html/body/div[3]/div[3]/span[4]/span/a"));sign.click();String myWindowHandle = driver.getWindowHandle();driver.switchTo().window(myWindowHandle);WebElement email_id= driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[@id='signin_info']/a[1]"));email_id.sendKeys("hi");If myWindowHandle is not the correct string, then let me know how to get the pop-up Window name, because I can't find the name of the pop-up window.
Please using this api: Iterator.next.
Answer:
response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next.
<<<code>>>: driver.switchTo().window(myWindowHandle);
<<<explanation>>>: This will switch to the pop-up window.
